Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera, right price.
Reviews.Author: Shylittlelatina "Regan"
Reviews.Content: when my old camera died on our last family vacation then it was time to go shopping for new one. When I bought this camera I waited until I used it a few times until I wrote the review and so far I like it. It is a bit complex to use though and it seems that there is no changing of settings like action and still, Etc.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera and accessory package
Reviews.Author: Tom
Reviews.Content: Arrived promptly and packaged well.  It is a good thing that it includes the replacement NB-11L Lithium-Ion Battery for Canon, because that is the only battery that comes with it.  I would suggest ordering a minimum of one extra battery (although I found good prices on Amazon for a two pack of  batteries), because the battery life is not too long.  Easy to use.  Mine came with a small (about 4inch) tabletop tripod that I was not expecting as it's not listed with the package.  The camera case had a small area on the bottom where the stitching was not complete, but nothing to complain about.  Overall I'm pretty satisfied.

ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in Wi-Fi allows you to wirelessly transfer your images to social networking sites through CANON iMAGE GATEWAY
8x Optical Zoom with 28mm Wide-Angle lens delivers stunning images and allows you to capture more in your frame
16.0 Megapixel sensor and DIGIC 4 Image Processor deliver exceptional performance
Smart AUTO intelligently selects the proper camera settings based on 32 predefined shooting situations for capturing spectacular images with ease
Shoot brilliant 720p HD video with a dedicated movie button
ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 130 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 8x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video Recording & Built in Wi-Fi (Gray) + 16GB Accessory Kit
